title: Bonus: I Am Spintax - The Podcast!
description:
To honor the 5th anniversary, enjoy this bonus episode from the Stitcher Premium series I Am Spintax! Spintax uses his arcane power to raise the dead (Salmagundi) and compel the living (OffBook's Jess McKenna).


Credits

Spintax: Charlie McCrackin

Jess: Jess McKenna

Salmagundi: Edgar Momplaisir

Craig: Ryan DiGiorgi

Leonard: C.J. Tuor


Producers: Matt Young, and Kimmie Lucas

Post-Production Coordination: Garrett Schultz

Special Assistance: Ryan DiGiorgi, Arnie Niekamp, Charlie McCrackin and C.J. Tuor

Editor: Garrett Schultz

Magic Tavern Logo: Allard Laban

Theme Music: Andy Poland


You can support the show directly and receive bonus episodes and rewards by joining our Patreon at https://www.patreon.com/magictavern for only $5 per month. Follow us on Twitter and Instagram, and now Patreon!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
